website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's newest smartwatch reinvents itself with a whole new look and feel to create one of the best-designed wrist gadgets around -- but it still lacks the apps to set it above the competition.
pros: The Gear S2 has an eye-catching design, a clever rotating bezel that's actually useful, beautiful display, solid health tracking and slightly better battery life than other high-end smartwatches
Plus, it works with a variety of Android phones
cons: Fewer available apps or seamless connected services than Android Wear and Apple Watch
S-Voice commands work, but not as well as they could

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but heavy
customer_reviews.text: When i purchase this watch i thought it would have more visibility. Very pretty but heavy, i returned the watch because I felt the watch did not do much for the price. Hard to respond to text messages and nearly impossible to hear people on phone calls. Good at counting your steps and evaluating your sleep but besides that I did not see the need for the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Carrero Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool if you have an Online Business
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and I like the features and how you access them. Was a bit of a pain to download the required apps before I could install on my Android but once you get everything downloaded and upgraded, it works quite well. I specifically ordered this so I could review emails when I was away from my computer and on kayaking trips as I have several online businesses that require constant monitoring for customer orders and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: KayakingKim

customer_reviews.title: Speech to text does not work. this is a known issue.
customer_reviews.text: Watch is great. easily maneuverable. Speech to text DOES NOT WORK currently. this is a known issue Samsung hasn't fixed with an update. I will be keeping the watch and hoping for an update soon.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Liked, very expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, I am not allowed to have my cell phone on person at work. I leave my phone in my locker, and get messages, I can see who's calling. Cons...Some days the battery does not last very long. You can't actually answer calls, or hear music. The white band has turned green from my employee jacket. Kind of pricey, Amazon does not offer warranty for additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: The Classic Rose Gold Samsung Gear S2 looks beautiful on her wrist!
customer_reviews.text: The design, style and functionality are perfectly suited for her - looks beautiful on her wrist! The more advanced features of fitness tracking, continual and automatic heartrate monitor, outweigh the sleep monitoring. How feasible is quality of sleep monitoring when performed from one's wrist anyway? My wife loves this watch.
customer_reviews.author: HowyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this watch I got the protector for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this watch I got the protector for the front of the face and then the extra band to go with it I get so many compliments everywhere I go on it and it does so much it has some stuff I don't even use but I love all the different functions on it plus it's very pretty on my arm not like a sporty watch. My boyfriend got it for me for my birthday I literally research for a Homa before I bought this are we got this one great choice
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far - but I am still learning all of the features. A couple of things that are annoying: short battery life and the wrist band's quality is not that great and it is huge! I have slim wrists (6 inches) and have to wear the watch on the second hole and it still twirls on my wrist :/ The first hole is too tight. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I cant say enough good things about this watch
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough good things about this watch. I have used it every day since I purchased it. The design and size is PERFECT for a females wrist. I have gotten so many compliments. A lot of people didn't notice it was a smart watch until the face lit up with a notification. So sleek and stylish!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *The battery life is horrible. Charge after 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's ok. *The battery life is horrible. Charge after 6 hours. * Sleep is not accurate. * Doesn't always sync accurate info to phone. I would have research something else, if I would have read honest reviews that I read Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Love good deals :)

customer_reviews.title: Well, the wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she loves it. The white leather band gets dirty quickly, so ordered a different band. Otherwise it's a great product. It's size is smaller than the S3 Frontier (mine), and it fits her well.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Microphone
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot. First smartwatch I've had. Only complaint is the microphone does not pick up my voice very often to convert my words to text, that's frustrating. Also, I did not like the feel of the leather band, I ordered a rose gold band from China that looks classy, like it should have come with the watch originally.

Only complaint I would have is that it the surface can be sensitive touch when you don't intend to touch it .

I love how you can change the clock face to make it to your liking. Wish they would come out with a little more designs but still have tons. I also like how it looks like a regular watch one of my favorite things about it. I highly suggest this to whoever is looking for a watch that connects to your phone.

Samsung refused to cover under warantee. Disappointing to say the least after spending $350 on the watch. Wouldn't recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed :(.... but a BEAUTIFUL watch
customer_reviews.text: First off I absolutely love this watch! I was told by Verizon once I received the watch to contact Verizon sales for them to assign the watch a seperate phone number. I called and they needed the IMEI number on the back of the watch plate which this watch did not appear to have. So, Verizon said I could only use this watch by using Bluetooth and not as a stand along line. :( So, I sent the watch back. :( Be sure before you buy if your service is with Verizon that the watch has a an IMEI number on it.

customer_reviews.title: There are 2 versions of every smart watch! Be aware and know what you're getting!
customer_reviews.text: This device can not stand alone! Meaning, even though you can pair it to many bt host devices, you cannot take calls on it. WHEN PURCHASING WATCHES FOR USE WITH CALLS, MAKE SURE IT HAS AN AUDIO OUTLET! Even many Samsung reps are not aware that these kinds of WATCHES are on the market. Please do your research and check out YouTube or another source before buying a smart watch! This one is not worth the money! It's a watch. That's it.

I'm a small woman so I always have issues finding watches that aren't to big looking on me and THIS WATCH IS PERFECT! the setup is easy and connects to my Samsung with no issues at all. The software design is amazing compared to the apple watch, especially the main menu. I especially love the way you could navigate with the circular dial. There are some app's you could download like different faces, GPS, and much more. I got this product on sale for $299.99 and I'm glad I did! I strongly recommend it!!!!!!!!

Constantly receiving updates that enhance the watches capability. It's durable, I abuse mine. Don't listen to reviews that complain about issues that have to do with software, or flat out lies about its durability. This is a great smart watch
customer_reviews.author: Fotop

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bride after I caught her eyeing our friend's new smartwatch with a tinge of jealousy. Best. Purchase. Ever. It pairs wonderfully with her Galaxy S7 Edge, she has not had any problems syncing or getting it to understand her commands, and the watch has a VERY classy look and weight to it. This watch gets noticed. Word to the wise, though: buy yourself some screen protectors at the same time. Most basic screen protectors are inexpensive, come with a few in the box, and will save you when you realize exactly how often a person dings their watch against random surfaces.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not usually a watch person but this watch is fantastic. I have had no problems with it in ...

I only wore it for a couple of hours yesterday, no workouts or anything strenuous, set it to charge and put it back on this morning. If this is what happens with a couple of hours of wear, what can I expect in a month?

customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and designed well. The proprietary Samsung operating system on the watch is a drawback because of the limited number of apps available. But the apps that are available are good. The watch is everything it is reported to be.

customer_reviews.title: Don't switch to IOS.
customer_reviews.text: This watch worked beautifully when I had my Samsung S7 Edge. However, I'm pretty bummed about the watch now. It says it's iOS compatible, but when I switched over to iPhone, it no longer allows you to do quite a few things, and disconnects from the phone multiple times a day, making it almost pointless to have the watch! I've had it for less than 2 months and can't utilize it any longer. It's really disappointing when you say you'll work with something that you don't.

This watch is the only decent feminine watch of its kind and I feel in love with it only for it to deceit me!

customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied. Returned immediately. Came broken, in a box with no protection, freely moving around in it. Watch had a ton of defects, distortion, and the screen had an image burnt into it.

customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, but the strap was loose and come out frequently. Cant receive calls.Had to return. Everything else seemed normal as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: manasjit

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, but 2 major problems.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I love the watch however there are two reasons I have to return it. For one it has "touch here to explore" stained on the screen so any screen you swipe to on the watch shows that, and for two the battery only lasted 4 hours. It didnt even last till lunch time at work for me. Big disappointment. I could have lived with the stained screen, but the battery life just does not make it possible to keep. Otherwise it is a good watch, just wish it didn't have those issues.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but the music ......
customer_reviews.text: This watch is everything that I wanted! The style of this watch is perfect! The combination of rose gold and the leather band is very classic and matches everything. I can literally wear it and not a lot of people realize that it's a smartwatch. I have a very small wrist, and this watch is still small enough that it does not move around my wrist constantly. The only draw back is the fact that the music app is no longer free. I've used the watch with my amazon music account, but the app already has to be open in order for the watch to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical, and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've now had my watch for over a year and discovered that I was the culprit for the low battery life. Fixed my ways and find that the battery now last for 4 days. I am constantly getting compliments on my watch. Durability has been fantastic. No scratches on the watch face. One of the best Gifts I've given myself! Upgraded from the Gear Fit. Love the ease of use and the larger screen. Plus the ability to program the things I want! Battery lasts 2 days - A pleasant surprise with all the things that I use it for!
customer_reviews.author: K Appleyard

customer_reviews.title: Best watch out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I have a very small wrist and have put off buying a smart watch because I didn't want to look like I had a laptop strapped to my arm. This watch fits great and looks like a real watch. I bought the rose gold S2 classic and I am always getting compliments. It does great at tracking my steps and keeping me notified of my texts and calls. It's so nice not to have to have my phone attached to me and still be able to get my calls/texts!
customer_reviews.author: TripleTmom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful smart watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful smart watch. I'm so happy that someone finally has released a watch that not only has great functionality but is also beautiful. I've had a ton of compliments on this watch since I wear it everyday! I like all the little gadgets which are expected of smartwatches, but what really drew me to it is the appearance. I did replace the leather band with a metal one that matches it though. I love that I can change the face of the watch, and that there are regularly updates and new features.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it. Girlfriend uses it everyday for everything. While you are unable to make or take phone call on this watch you can do virtually everything else. This watch hooks up to your phone and you receive all your phone updates. Your able to reply to text messages or emails. It is a fitness tracker. Looks great with the white wrist band.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J. Kalinowski

customer_reviews.title: Don't use it in the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Got my watch in February 2017 and it's been great. Now that's summer is here i used it in the pool and now have issues. The pool is only 5' deep and i know i wasn't in the pool for 30 minutes. Gonna wait and see if it totally dies but most likely will be replacing this.
customer_reviews.author: susan sinclair

customer_reviews.title: love this watch
customer_reviews.text: love this watch, I wear it everyday. The battery only last 1 day for me, but I really do not mind as I take it off and put it right on its wireless charger at night. this watch looks so much like a real traditional watch and less like a computer on your arm. This is definitely a better alternative for those who love classic time pieces.
customer_reviews.author: LAURICE L

customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the rose gold classic and I absolutely love it. The color is gorgeous, and I always get compliments on it. It doesn't even look like a typical smartwatch, it has brains and brawn and I love it! I am able to change the face on the watch, sending and receiving text messages is super easy. The vibration is very subtle. It's awesome very pleased with my purchase. Only downside is I feel that the apps are pretty limited but other than that its sexy smart watch

customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but short battery life makes it not practical for sleep function.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend So Far
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far, haven't had it long, but it's easy, intuitive, battery lasts easily for a full day, and it's really pretty. It's also saving the battery on my cell phone, because I'm not checking it every 3 minutes for messages and reminders. Also, the watch face can be customized in a couple dozen ways - fun, serious, down-to-business, etc. And, it connects to a lot of apps and tracks fitness activity (and nudges me if I'm sitting too long 😂). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KathiW

customer_reviews.title: like when you place it on the charger it flashes ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been ok. Has some buggy issues, like when you place it on the charger it flashes several screens in a row. Also, after you input the pin code, if makes you constantly re enter it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: i love this. the band however gets dirty pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: i love this. the band however gets dirty pretty quick. it may be because its white. battery life is pretty great. its a great tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Warangkan Choorat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, my girlfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, my girlfriend loves it. Only down side, Samsung doesn't have continous heart rate monitoring like a fit bit, so calories burnt are not as accurate
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Velez

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my wife. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She loves it. Very classy for everyday use. Tons of stuff to weed through to figure out what you want and don't want but that is to be expected with any new technology.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Swing

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: huge fan of most Samsung mobile products, the face is a bit small even though its supposed to be more feminine should be a little larger, but its definitely a very classy look
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: This watch is not only smart, it's stylish too!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is not only smart it's stylish too. I love the heart rate monitor, the apps, and that I can go to a meeting and discreetly respond to texts or decline phone calls. I would like to see more apps available for the Gear S2.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAnna

customer_reviews.title: ... was worth it got it on Amazon at the perfect timing price has almost doubled
customer_reviews.text: The wait was worth it got it on Amazon at the perfect timing price has almost doubled. My wife love her xmas gift kudos to samsung for making such amazing products.
customer_reviews.author: george diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch!!- hate the wristband!
customer_reviews.text: I love the classic , best watch on the market! But the standard wristband is a terrible off white color that ABORBS dirt. It was smudged within 30 seconds of handling it. Just realize your paying an extra 30-40 bucks for a wrist band you want
customer_reviews.author: Jessi K

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch does everything it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Love my watch does everything it says it does. I have no other one to compare it to works great I highly suggest
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great and the color will turn heads my wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vincent IV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most durable and classy Smartwatch I've ever seen. I've received many compliments about this watch's eye appeal.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

product_meta.title: Samsung Gear S2 Smartwatch - Classic Rose Gold
product_meta.description:
Elevate your style with the Samsung Gear S2 classic Rose Gold. Genuine Leather, precious metal and exceptional finishes come together to create a sophisticated wearable that goes with anything. The intuitive circular face and bezel let you navigate effortlessly to Get to what you need. With access to important notifications at a glance, the head-turning Samsung Gear S2 classic Rose Gold gives you more out of every moment of your day. Display: 1.2” Full Circular sAMOLED, 360 x 360 (302ppi) 

1 Compatible with select Bluetooth capable smartphones using Android OS 4.4 and later with at least 1.5GB RAM as well as iPhone 5 and later with iOS 9.0 and above. Not all features available with iOS paired smartphones. Gear S3 supported smartphones may vary by carrier and device. For a list of compatible smartphones and features, please visit samsung.com/gearS3. For best results, connect with compatible Samsung Galaxy smartphones.
feature_bullets: Step up your style with the new 18K rose gold and platinum models*, paired with genuine leather straps. *18K gold or platinum plated finishes
Send and receive texts, calendar notifications, news updates and more right on the Gear S2 classic.OS-Tizen based wearable platform.Processor speed-Dual core 1GHz exynos 3250
Choose from hundreds of custom watch faces to match your style and Battery performance may vary depending on network conditions and configuration, and device usage
Complete your individual style with a selection of optional watch straps, creating a personalized look for every moments

Compatible with select Bluetooth capable smartphones using Android OS 4.4 and later with at least 1.5GB RAM as well as iPhone 5 and later with iOS 9.0 and above.It doesn't have speakers, hence use Level U bluetooth headphones to hear music
